sentences.en: Are you trying to suffocate us with that putrid smell?
sentences.cn: 你是想用那讨厌的气味把我们窒息死 吧 ?

sentences.en: But they do suffocate from a lack of air.
sentences.cn: 但它们确实也会因为缺少空气而窒息.

sentences.en: Covering beds in enough pillows to suffocate an entire old people's home.
sentences.cn: 89在床上放满枕头,多得都能把老人窒息.

sentences.en: ExIt'suffocate suffocate , achieve collect drop considerably.
sentences.cn: 出口受阻,创汇大幅下降.

sentences.en: He uses a combination of length, quickness and tenacity to suffocate his opponents.
sentences.cn: 他的臂展, 敏捷性以及坚韧的防守意志令所有对手胆战心惊.

sentences.en: I was so suffocate, so desperate, while like another other dreams, I was always mute.
sentences.cn: 我感到窒息, 绝望.和所以别的梦一样, 我只能无声.

sentences.en: If you could change one thing about yourself, what would it be? Suffocate my candor.
sentences.cn: 如果你能改变自己身上一样东西, 你会改变什么? 把我的心直口快给憋死.

sentences.en: If you shut all the windows, I will suffocate.
sentences.cn: 如果你把窗户全部关起来, 我就会闷死.

sentences.en: If you stayed seated, he said, you'd suffocate.
sentences.cn: 如果你还留在座位上, 他说, 你就窒息了.

sentences.en: One of the puppies suffocated inside the plastic bag.
sentences.cn: 其中一只小狗在塑料袋里闷死了。

sentences.en: She felt often she must suffocate.
sentences.cn: 她不时感到自己非窒息致死不可.

sentences.en: Suffocate and send to until the last days of one's life talented poetess only!
sentences.cn: 无非是把有点才气的女诗人窒息致死而后已!

sentences.en: The animal seizes its prey by the throat and suffocates it to death.
sentences.cn: 这种动物会抓住猎物的喉咙，使其窒息而死。

sentences.en: The frog spawn needs air and would suffocate in the stagnant pool below.
sentences.cn: 蛙卵需要空气,在不流动的水池里会窒息而死.

sentences.en: The heat is tolerable at night but suffocate during the day.
sentences.cn: 在夜间尚能忍受这种高温,但白天就令人感到呼吸困难.

sentences.en: The stale air made us suffocate.
sentences.cn: 浑浊的空气使我们感到窒息.

words.tran_cn: 令人窒息的，喘不过气的

trans.tran_cn: 使窒息, 噎住, 闷熄
trans.tran_en: to die or make someone die by preventing them from breathing

trans.tran_cn: 呼吸困难，窒息，受扼制，受阻（发展不了）
（使某人）窒息而死，（将某人）闷死，阻碍
